meanings.definition: Having or showing a lack of intelligence or good judgment.
meanings.sent1: He made a stupider decision by not studying for the test.
meanings.sent2: She felt stupider after forgetting her keys for the third time.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to catch its tail made it look even stupider.
meanings.sent4: The broken compass led them into even stupider situations.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds made the sky look stupider than usual.

meanings.definition: Less intelligent or capable than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The older model of the phone seemed stupider compared to the new one.
meanings.sent2: The puppy appeared stupider than the older dogs in the park.
meanings.sent3: The robot's malfunction made it act even stupider than usual.
meanings.sent4: The fading light made the path seem stupider than it actually was.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out shoes made his outfit look stupider than he realized.
